About This Recipe Collection

Welcome to my personal recipe collection! This site is designed to be a simple, mobile-friendly reference while cooking.

Features

  • Mobile-first design for easy reading while cooking
  • Ingredient checkboxes to track what you've added
  • Clear step-by-step instructions
  • Search functionality to quickly find recipes

Adding New Recipes

To add a new recipe, create a markdown file in the src/recipes/ directory with the following frontmatter:

---
layout: layouts/recipe.njk
title: Recipe Name
author: Your Name
description: Brief description
prepTime: 15 min
cookTime: 30 min
servings: 4
tags:
  - recipes
  - category1
  - category2
ingredients:
  - Ingredient 1
  - Ingredient 2
instructions:
  - Step 1
  - Step 2
notes: Optional notes
---
